name: Shadoward

abilities.name: Terra Growth
abilities.desc: Increase the possessor's Nature-type moves' power to 50%.

abilities.name: Agility (Secret)
abilities.desc: Increase the possessor's Speed stat by 1 stage at the end of each turn.

description: Shadoward lurk inside the forest and usually go active at night. They use the red end of the tail as a bait to lure their prey to their hunting ground. Combined with their green mane, they become very hard to be spotted out, making them a fearsome assassin.

moves_level.name: Accelerate
moves_level.effect: Accelerate to boost the user's Speed stat.

moves_level.name: Dodge
moves_level.effect: Dodge upcoming attack(s), but reduce success rate by 50% if used consecutively with any other evasion moves.

moves_level.name: Quick Strike
moves_level.effect: Lunges at the opponent quickly before the target can react. This move has a +1 priority.

moves_level.name: Stalk
moves_level.effect: Stalk the opponent, allowing the next move to have +1 priority and 50% critical hit chance.

moves_level.name: Fury Cutter
moves_level.effect: Slash the opponent with scythe-like attack. Consecutive success uses of this move increases the power by 5 each time (Max. 30).

moves_level.name: Shadow Claw
moves_level.effect: Slash the opponent with claws made from shadow. This move has a 10% critical hit chance.

moves_level.name: Quick Feet
moves_level.effect: Use faster footwork to raise the user's Evasion stat.

moves_level.name: Shadow Sneak
moves_level.effect: Sneak in the dark and attack the next turn. The user becomes untargetable by all non-Light typed moves during this turn.

moves_level.name: Swift Cut
moves_level.effect: The user reacts quickly and uses its deadly tail to counter the enemy attack. This move has +2 priority but will fail if the opponent is not readying an attack.

moves_level.name: Phantom Force
moves_level.effect: Surround the body with a swirl of dark energy then strike at the opponent. This move has 20% chance of lowering the target's Attack stat.

moves_level.name: Forest Glide
moves_level.effect: Glide through the forest to strike at the opponent. If the battle takes place in Forest Terrain, this move has +1 priority.

moves_tutor.name: Rest
moves_tutor.effect: Rest for 2 turns. Each turn restores the user's HP by 50% and Stamina by 25%. This move also removes all status condition.

moves_tutor.name: Tail Slap
moves_tutor.effect: Slap the opponent with a tail. This move has a 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.

moves_tutor.name: Battle Dance
moves_tutor.effect: Uplift the fighting spirit with a battle dance. This move boosts the user's Attack stat and Speed stat.

moves_tutor.name: Grassy Blast
moves_tutor.effect: Draw power from nature and blast at the opponent. This move has a 20% chance to cause the target to flinch.

moves_tutor.name: Photosynthesis
moves_tutor.effect: Restore the user's HP by 25%. During harsh sunlight, this move restores 50% instead.

moves_tutor.name: Pursuit
moves_tutor.effect: Chase after the opponent and inflict double damage if the target switches out.

moves_tutor.name: Scavenge
moves_tutor.effect: Swoop down and strike the opponent. This move has a 25% chance of stealing the opponent's item.

moves_tutor.name: Sand Attack
moves_tutor.effect: Hurl sand at the opponent to lower the target's Accuracy.

moves_tutor.name: Iron Tail
moves_tutor.effect: Slam the opponent with a steel-hard tail. This move has a 30% chance of reducing the target's Defense stat by one stage.

moves_tutor.name: Poison Tail
moves_tutor.effect: Hit the opponent with a poisonous tail. This move has a 10% chance of poisoning the target.
